metadata.title: CVE-2014-2983 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Drupal 6.x before 6.31 and 7.x before 7.27 does not properly isolate thecached data of different anonymous users, which allows remote anonymoususers to obtain sensitive interim form input information in opportunisticsituations via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
